title: Global ulcerative colitis market 2012 and 2022
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows a growth forecast for the Global ulcerative colitis Market in 2022 and shows the actual projected Market value of the ulcerative colitis Market in 2012 .
For 2022 , the Global smart ulcerative colitis Market is forecasted to reach 6.6 billion U.S. dollars .
The predicted compound annual growth rate between 2012 and 2022 should be 26.3 billion .
